tweets.text: @IainAMalcolm @FreshwaterIzzy @LacLaurence @carlsayerUCL Need combination of spatially balanced, risk based and existing long term monitoring. Which is exactly how it is. Can debate about the effort devoted to each of these three, but in the end only spatially balanced can be used for national reporting

We did it! Saltwells is now a NATIONAL NATURE RESERVE!!!! Thank you @NE_WestMids! @unescouk @BCgeopark  #saltwellsnnr #geology @BritGeoSurvey @geolsoc @BCGeoSoc  @GeolAssoc @discoverdudley @envagency @CRTWestMidlands @TonyJuniper @themjcouk @lgcplus @EnvAgencyMids @DudleyNature https://t.co/woocz6aPWZ

tweets.text:
Leave this with you. You decide if its acceptable that rivers are treated like open sewers. The last 12 months I've filmed more sanitary products than fish underwater. The great sanitary migration is coming soon.
#Pollution #sewage #environment #rivers https://t.co/ju5B8Dve45
With Government now routinely testing sewage for traces of COVID maybe now‚Äôs a good time to stop pumping that same raw sewage into our rivers and ocean? #EndSewagePollution https://t.co/HReph4bEq2
